data.what_is: CATO is an algorithmic marketing platform that allows you to run high performing marketing campaigns at scale, with ease Just like how algorithmic trading platforms simplify trading execution at scale.CATO's built-in algorithms automate every activity of campaign management right from defining the target audience to planning, designing, scheduling, execution, tracking, and optimization.
data.product_description: CATO is an algorithmic marketing platform that allows you to run high performing marketing campaigns at scale, with ease Just like how algorithmic trading platforms simplify trading execution at scale.CATO's built-in algorithms automate every activity of campaign management right from defining the target audience to planning, designing, scheduling, execution, tracking, and optimization.

initial_reviews.review_title: It's new to me, but I'm loving it so far
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquigo?
This program has really helped us to streamline email marketing and not waste our time on dead leads

What do you dislike about Acquigo?
So far there is nothing I dislike about it

What problems is Acquigo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reviewing customer data and making sure we are targeting the right groups of people. Also ensuring the info we send is relevant

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Acquigo?
review_question_answers.answer: This program has really helped us to streamline email marketing and not waste our time on dead leads

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Acquigo?
review_question_answers.answer: So far there is nothing I dislike about it

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Acquigo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Reviewing customer data and making sure we are targeting the right groups of people. Also ensuring the info we send is relevant

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Acquigo?
There wasn't much to like. The price was good and the trial was worthwhile to run, but nothing stood out as an advantage.

What do you dislike about Acquigo?
It was clunky and unintuitive and it seemed like we would never be able to get the entire organization to adopt it

What problems is Acquigo solving and how is that benefiting you?
It didn't end up solving any problems for us unfortunately. If the software worked for us it would have been a benefit financially
